import styles from "../styles/Enquiry.module.css"; import ImageUpload from "./ImageUpload"; let name = document.getElementsByName("customerName"); let email = document.getElementsByName("customerEmail"); let phoneNum = document.getElementsByName("customerPhone"); let carMake = document.getElementsByName("carMake"); let carModel = document.getElementsByName("carModel"); let carYear = document.getElementsByName("carYear"); function EnquiryForm() { document.addEventListener("submit", function (e) { e.preventDefault(); }); const testing = () => { const idle = document.getElementsByName("idle").checked; console.log(idle); }; return (
); } export default EnquiryForm;
